title: A Child of God
shortDescription: Learn and memorize John 1:12 — 'Yet to all who received him...'
learningGoal: memorize and apply 'I am a child of God'
childCopy: Repeat the verse and help an NPC remember they belong to God's family.
matureNote: Explains adoption language in Scripture and implications for identity.
acceptanceCriteria: Player recites the verse and explains 'belonging' in simple words.

title: I Am Loved
shortDescription: Memorize Romans 8:38-39 and reflect on God's unchanging love.
childCopy: Find the hidden hearts and hear how God loves you.
matureNote: Discuss the depth of God's love and pastoral care for doubts.
acceptanceCriteria: Player states one way God shows love; memorization check >= 75%.

title: I Am Forgiven
shortDescription: Learn 1 John 1:9 and practice confession + forgiveness in a roleplay.
learningGoal: understand forgiveness and its effect on community
childCopy: Practice saying 'I'm sorry' and accept forgiveness in the story.
matureNote: Mature Mode includes pastoral guidance for confession and accountability.
acceptanceCriteria: Player completes roleplay and chooses a restorative action.

title: Citizen of Heaven
shortDescription: Explore Philippians 3:20 and learn about spiritual citizenship.
childCopy: Choose how to live as a citizen of heaven in small choices.
matureNote: Explore privileges and responsibilities of kingdom citizenship.
acceptanceCriteria: Player chooses kingdom‑oriented responses in scenarios.

title: I am accepted
shortDescription: Learn Romans 15:7 and reflect on being accepted by God in Christ.
learningGoal: internalize 'I am accepted' and practice acceptance in community
childCopy: Share a welcome message and add an acceptance note to the wall.
matureNote: Discuss theological dimensions of acceptance and grace.
acceptanceCriteria: Player records a short acceptance note or invites another NPC into community.

title: I Am Chosen
shortDescription: Memorize 1 Peter 2:9 and reflect on being chosen by God.
learningGoal: claim identity as chosen and explore purpose
childCopy: Find the 'chosen' stones and write your name on one.
matureNote: Explore election language sensitively and focus on vocation and calling.
acceptanceCriteria: Player explains a simple way they are chosen to serve.

title: I Am Never Alone
shortDescription: Reflect on Hebrews 13:5 and practice trusting God's presence.
childCopy: Help an NPC who feels alone by reminding them of God's presence.
matureNote: Discuss pastoral practices for loneliness and spiritual support.
acceptanceCriteria: Player identifies two ways God is present in hard times.

title: I Am Redeemed
shortDescription: Study Galatians 3:13 and reflect on redemption in Christ.
learningGoal: understand redemption and freedom in Christ
childCopy: Solve a small puzzle that shows being rescued and set free.
matureNote: Theology of redemption and its implications for identity and mission.
acceptanceCriteria: Player retells the story of redemption and names one personal application.

title: I Am a Friend of God
shortDescription: Explore John 15:15 and practice friendship with Jesus through obedience.
learningGoal: internalize friendship with God and respond in obedience
childCopy: Complete small tasks that show friendship and trust.
matureNote: Consider spiritual friendship and disciplines in Mature Mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Player lists one way to be a friend of God through obedience.

title: I Am God's Ambassador
shortDescription: Learn 2 Corinthians 5:20 and practice sharing reconciling words.
learningGoal: understand ambassador role and practice reconciliation
childCopy: Help two characters reconcile by choosing kind, truthful words.
matureNote: Discuss representing Christ in public life and ethical speech.
acceptanceCriteria: Player demonstrates a reconciling response in dialog.

title: I Am Free in Christ
shortDescription: Memorize Galatians 5:1 and reflect on spiritual freedom.
learningGoal: understand freedom in Christ and live accordingly
childCopy: Make choices that show healthy freedom and responsibility.
matureNote: Discuss liberty and responsibility; avoid antinomianism.
acceptanceCriteria: Player selects responsible choices that reflect freedom in Christ.

title: I Am Royalty
shortDescription: Explore 1 Peter 2:9 and consider what it means to be part of God's royal family.
learningGoal: embrace dignity and responsibility in Christ
childCopy: Complete a stewardship task that reflects royal responsibility.
matureNote: Discuss priesthood and royalty metaphors in Scripture.
acceptanceCriteria: Player identifies one royal responsibility they can practice.

title: I Am Made New
shortDescription: Memorize 2 Corinthians 5:17 and reflect on new life in Christ.
childCopy: Tell the story of a changed life and mark a new start in your journal.
matureNote: Discuss sanctification and what 'new creation' means theologically.
acceptanceCriteria: Player explains one practical change that shows new life.

title: I Am Safe
shortDescription: Learn Psalm 91 and practice trusting God as refuge.
learningGoal: know God as refuge and respond in trust
childCopy: Help an NPC who is afraid and remind them of God's protection.
matureNote: Address pastoral care for anxiety with Scripture and prayer.
acceptanceCriteria: Player identifies two ways Scripture offers comfort in fear.

title: I Am Renewed
shortDescription: Reflect on Ephesians 4:23 and practices that renew the mind.
learningGoal: practice renewal through Scripture and prayer
childCopy: Complete a small daily practice that renews your thinking.
matureNote: Discuss spiritual disciplines and renewal over time.
acceptanceCriteria: Player lists a renewing practice and demonstrates it in-game.

title: I Am Blessed
shortDescription: Study Ephesians 1:3 and recognize spiritual blessings in Christ.
learningGoal: acknowledge and thank God for spiritual blessings
childCopy: Collect 'blessing' cards and add them to your journal.
matureNote: Explore spiritual blessings and stewardship of grace.
acceptanceCriteria: Player records three blessings they can thank God for.

title: I Have a Purpose
shortDescription: Learn Ephesians 2:10 and reflect on God-given purpose and service.
learningGoal: discover and practice one's God-given purpose
childCopy: Complete a small mission that shows your unique gifts.
matureNote: Discuss vocation, calling, and servant leadership.
acceptanceCriteria: Player outlines one purpose-driven action to try this week.
